Avana Alexandria is within easy reach of the ultimate in high-end shopping, upscale dining, hot-spot nightlife and the latest entertainment selections. Find it all around, from downtown Washington DC, Old Town Alexandria, and The Village at Shirlington to desirable Arlington neighborhoods such as Clarendon, Rosslyn, Ballston, Pentagon City, and Crystal City. Even National Harbor, an ever-evolving waterfront destination, is close by. With instant access to I-395 and an address minutes from the Metros Yellow and Blue lines, getting to any destination is as easy as a few minutes drive and everything is at your fingertips.

Description: Join the growing community of Cascade at Landmark today in an exceptional one or two bedroom apartment home. Our Alexandria, VA apartments offer the comfort and convenience of apartment living in a location that puts the outdoors, great shopping and delicious dining all within your reach. If you enjoy spending time in nature, you will be happy to find numerous parks just moments from our community like Bren Mar Park, which offers picnic areas, playgrounds and a swimming pool. When you are in need of some retail therapy, you will be only minutes from the blue link of the Van Dorn Metro, Interstate 395 and Old Town Alexandria. Our area offers an array of great options for eating out. Our residents can relax next to our sparkling swimming pool, getting a workout in our fitness center complete with cardio and free weight equipment. We are a pet-friendly apartment community and our leasing center is open seven days a week for your convenience.

Description: South Port is nestled on 22 acres near the corner of Edsall Rd and Van Dorn Street. Our spacious homes offer you comfortable living with the privacy of a garden apartment. Community amenities include a fitness center, sparkling blue swimming pool, redesigned community room, and playground. Navigate the area with various convenient transportation options. These spectacular Alexandria apartments are on the Metro Bus line with direct access to the Van Dorn Metro Station. You'll have easy access to downtown Washington DC on I-395, I-495 and Route 236. South Port is minutes to Old Town Alexandria with historic sites, galleries, shopping and restaurants. Whether you're a history buff or enjoy the excitement of a hometown parade, there is always something fun and exciting to do in Alexandria! The City offers everything from historic walking tours to diverse cultural festivals and high impact outdoor recreation to the oldest continuously running farmers market in historic Market Square.

Description: New look, new style and new attitude in the heart of Old Town. Come see the Metro Urban lifestyle of the newly renovated apartment homes at Bridgeyard. Located just off of I-95/ 495 on the shore of the Potomac River in Alexandria, Bridgeyard's 2 Big Red Brick Towers offer efficiency, one and two-bedroom apartment homes. Newly renovated means gorgeous wood flooring. There is new lido cabinetry, counter tops and new appliances now with a microwave. Energy efficient windows keep the temperature to your liking. Amenities abound with access to the on site Pool and Fitness Center, not to mention our in-house Convenience Store. You'll even get to enjoy the convenience of the security and convenience of the Butterfly MX smartphone intercom system! This High-Rise apartment provides Spectacular views of the Potomac River, Alexandria cityscapes or the close by Old Town Alexandria. Jump on the Bike/Jogging/Walking trail that runs along the river side boundary of the property and continues into the local riverside park a few miles down the trail.

Description: Alexandria. It's enchanting. It's charming. Others call it lively. Romantic. Great for shopping. Amazing for foodies. Wonderful for walking. However you describe Alexandria, you're probably right. And with the coming of the brand-new apartments at Modera Tempo, you may just end adding another descriptor to your list: "home." Our vibrant neighborhood is essentially within a neighborhood, complete with a new main street, Smashburger and Starbucks right outside your front door, and just minutes to the Van Dorn Metro. Then there are the floor plans each with exquisite finishes and loads of layout options. And the grand finale: an amenities line-up second to none and a good dose of customer service that sets this lovely community apart from the pack. And we could go on. And on. And on about the amazing things that you'll find at Modera Tempo high ceilings, front-loading washers, wine lockers, pet spa, upgraded fixtures but it's best to see it up close and in person.

Our apartments boast nine foot ceilings, regal crown molding, and gorgeous designer kitchens and baths. Description: Presenting The Asher, brand new apartments in Old Town Alexandria, Virginia. Where the historic charm of tree-lined streets encounters the eclectic style of today's finest apartment living. Where the classic comfort of an urban refuge meets the contemporary convenience of easy access to shopping and dining, to culture and leisure, to a great neighborhood and the greater DC area. We're taking outdoor living to the next level--four levels to be exact--with four inspiring outdoor spaces with views of the nation's capital. Along with outstanding indoor amenities to spark a sense of community. All just one block from the Braddock Road Metro, in a LEED(R) certified, non-smoking residence where green living comes naturally. Learn more about the benefits of living in Alexandria.

Description: Newly renovated Seminary Towers Apartments in Alexandria, VA offers you a variety of choices and an unparalleled amenities package. These high-rise apartments for rent boast 22 spacious floor plans, along with private balcony or patio. Exercise at our two fitness centers (one with a roof-top view), take a refreshing dip in our large pool, or share a few laughs with friends in our clubroom. Need to get some work done? We also have a business center with high-speed Internet. You're sure to enjoy the convenience of controlled building access, elevators, and a concierge, too. * Just nine miles from Washington, DC, Seminary Towers is the ultimate location for Capital commuters. With direct access to the Metrorail, I-395, I-495, and I-95, your ride to the Pentagon, BRAC Building, or other places in DC will be a breeze. You'll also love living near charming Old Town Alexandria, as well as Van Dorn and Clarendon Metro Stations, Shirlington, Skyline Mall, and NOVA - Alexandria Campus.

Description: Enjoy apartment living in an ideal Alexandria location at Presidential Greens Apartments. Nestled off of Glebe Road, our Alexandria apartments are located just between I-395 and the Jefferson Davis Highway. Residents enjoy the easy access to Old Town Alexandria, Pentagon City Fashion Center, Reagan National Airport, and Downtown DC – all just minutes away. Across the street from the local bus stop, Presidential Greens provides convenient access to the best of Northern Virginia and the Washington DC Metro Area. Presidential Greens offers one and two bedroom apartments in a variety of floor plans that sometimes include a den for a more versatile apartment home. Select apartments have been professionally remodeled and feature modern energy efficient appliances and plenty of natural light. Take advantage of our on-site laundry facility and premier resident services. Come and take a personal tour of our impressive and convenient community today!

Description: The Alexander is located in an area of the city that makes exploring, commuting, and enjoying life a breeze. Our community is near the intersection of King St. and Interstate 395 to assist those with their own vehicle. If instead you prefer to let the metro be your chauffeur, then you are sure to enjoy our proximity to the Pentagon City and the Crystal City Metro stations. We even offer a free shuttle to the Pentagon City Metro station for extra convenience. While in the area you might stop into the Fashion Centre at Pentagon City for a new outfit. Old Town Alexandria and Crystal City also offer you a great deal to explore and enjoy. Experience the colonial spirit and the culinary creations of Old Town Alexandria via the King Street Trolley, which takes you throughout the cobblestone streets. Crystal City is Arlington's largest downtown, which now features many restaurants, cafes, specialty stores, and outdoor events. While in the city, you have to see a show at Synetic T...

Description: London Park Towers in the Landmark neighborhood in Alexandria, VA just one minute to I-395 and Duke Street. We offer huge studio, 1, 2 and 3 bedroom apartments. We’re in the center of everything you need. Public transit at your doorstep – MetroBus 25B stops here with service to Van Dorn MetroRail station. Just 5 minutes to the Capital Beltway (I-495) and Marc Center/BRAC 133. Only 15 minutes to Old Towne Alexandria, Potomac River waterfront, The Pentagon, Reagan National Airport and Washington DC. And in the neighborhood you'll find schools, grocery stores, great shopping, library & wonderful parks! Most apartments include a large living area with room for lots of furniture, a separate dining area with ceiling fan, sliding glass doors that open to a large balcony or patio, and natural light from large windows (we provide blinds throughout), central heat and air conditioning. Gas and electricity included in rent – you pay water/sewer. Cats are welcome. Property features include a swimming pool with sundeck, fitness center, business center, laundry and trash chute on each floor, telephone entry system, mail delivery in each building, on-site management office and 24-hour emergency maintenance. For more information and availability, visit www.londonparktowers.com.

Description: Woodmont Park in Alexandria, VA offers studio, 1, 2 and 3 bedrooms in garden-style and mid-rise buildings. We’re at the center of everything you need. Public transit is at your doorstep - Metro Buses stop here with service to Pentagon Metro station. DASH bus AT1 and AT2 stop here and go to the King St. Metro station. 3 minutes to I-395 at Seminary Rd. or Little River Tpk. (236/Duke St.). 10 minutes to Washington DC line, the Pentagon or Old Towne Alexandria. 5-10 minutes to grocery stores, shopping, restaurants, and services. 10 minutes to NOVA Community College. Next to huge park with 4.5 mile paved hiker-biker trail. One block to William Ramsay Recreation Center with fitness room, fields, courts, classes & activities for all! Apartment features include a large living area with room for lots of furniture, most with sliding glass doors to a covered balcony or patio, great views of Holmes Run Park, separate dining area with ceiling fan, wonderful natural light from large windows (we provide blinds throughout), and central heat and air conditioning. Mid-rise apartments have 5 levels (elevator in building), telephone entry system, and lobby. Garden-style apartments have 2 or 3 levels with enclosed stairs. Cats are welcome. Property features include a tennis court, relaxing pool with sundeck, play area with picnic tables and grills, tennis court, laundry and mail delivery in each building, on-site management office and 24-hour emergency maintenance. Utilities not included in garden-style – you pay for gas, electricity, water/sewer. Mid-rise apartments include gas and electricity – you pay only water/sewer. For more information and availability, visit www.woodmontparkapartments.com.

Description: Halstead Tower by Windsor is the destination for luxury apartment living in Alexandria, Virginia near Washington DC. The pet-friendly community has the highest quality features, such as the complimentary coffee bar, full-service fitness studio, golf simulator, billiards table, the 15th Floor lounge, media room, as well as the rooftop swimming pool, Jacuzzi, and fire pit overlooking Washington DC and the National Monuments. Indulgence after indulgence awaits. Our contemporary apartment homes, ranging from one bedroom to two-story penthouses have reached a level of luxury you simply won't find elsewhere. Our award-winning, architecturally designed apartments feature abundant expansive windows welcoming in natural sunlight. Select homes even offer stunning panoramic views of the monuments! Our gourmet kitchens are fit for a chef with granite countertops, energy-efficient stainless steel appliances, and 42" custom wood cabinetry. In addition, our luxurious homes enjoy full- size washers

Description: Of the multitudes comparing apartments in Alexandria, VA, there are a select few who will settle for nothing but the best. For them, we have two words: Park Vue. These Alexandria apartments are minutes from the Pentagon, Arlington, Crystal City, Old Town Alexandria, Reagan National Airport and the Fashion Centre at Pentagon City. Park Vue of Alexandria apartments offer a "premier inside-the-Beltway" location and the peace of mind you expect from a gated community. At Park Vue, you'll enjoy panoramic views, beautiful landscaping, spacious floor plans, fully equipped kitchens, an electronic entry system, and ample parking. Park Vue of Alexandria offers you the luxury and convenience your active lifestyle demands from exceptional Alexandria, VA apartments.

Description: Located within walking distance to the Van Dorn Street Metro and with direct access to the Beltway, Reserve at Eisenhower apartments in Alexandria, VA, offer both convenience and class. Our spacious Reserve at Eisenhower apartments feature island kitchens, in-home washers and dryers, over-sized closets and high-end finishes throughout. Enjoy the rooftop tennis court, 24-hour fitness center, pool and picnic areas. Residents of our Reserve at Eisenhower can also take advantage of our clubhouse and 24-hour business center with free Wi-Fi. We are just minutes away from great restaurants, shopping and entertainment in Old Town Alexandria and Kingstowne Shopping Center.

Description: Welcome to Lloyd Apartments, where your amenities are as central as your address. Set among seven lush acres in Alexandria, Virginia, our community provides the unique combination of affordability and access. Lloyd Apartments offer expansive floor plans from 650 to 870 square feet with utilities included. Enjoy abundant light from windows in every room, including the kitchen and bathroom. Elegant foyers and hallways boast hardwood floors. The bathroom is equipped with a soaking tub and shower with tile flooring. We provide the convenience of on-site laundry facilities. Free parking is available for resident. Our 24-hour on-site maintenance staff keeps the landscape impeccably maintained. Your surroundings are home to a lively array of restaurants, shops, and clubs. From the chic boutiques and cafes of Shirlington Village and Del Ray, to the biking and running trails next door, your options are never-ending.

Description: Monticello-Lee Apartments combine all the charm, excitement, and style that are the unique hallmarks of Old Town Alexandria. Located just off the scenic Mount Vernon Bike Trail and Potomac Waterfront, Monticello Lee's articulately planned formal gardens lead to architecturally distinctive buildings featuring intimate designer lobbies and wide, carpeted corridors. Your unique home is but steps from some of the area's finest restaurants, live entertainment, and outdoor cafes reflecting a vibrant and distinguished neighborhood atmosphere. Furthermore, quick access to the King Street Metro, George Washington Parkway, and Capital Beltway make Southern Old Town an ideal location for the every day commuter. Whether coming home for peaceful solitude or strolling Old Town for an evening out, love is inevitable at Monticello-Lee Apartments. *Prices are subject to change. FREE PARKING, NO MOVE IN FEES!! Government employee, military, student, teacher, nurse and law enforcement discounts available!!!

Description: The Courts of Mount Vernon is a grassy, shady retreat from busy life, which is surrounded by quiet streets and family homes and close to schools and churches. It's a place where you can come home and really unwind, where you can feel far away, yet get back in the thick of things in a second. Now you can get away without getting out of touch. You can have it all, privacy from crowds plus convenience to the places you want to go. Now you can choose a one, two, or three bedroom apartment with updated comfort and out-of-the-way seclusion, tucked away in the trees in a pretty residential neighborhood, just off Route 1, minutes from the Beltway. The Courts of Mount Vernon is a getaway that's great for coming and going!

Description: Welcome to Southern Towers in Alexandria, VA! Just off of I-395 in Alexandria, Southern Towers is conveniently located right across the street from the Mark Center Transit Station. You'll be just moments away from shopping and dining at Shirlington or Bailey's Crossroads. With a major bus transit hub with over 100 buses on-site daily you can get into the city or go visit the Pentagon within minutes. Or stay local and spend the day engaged in arts culture or browsing through museums and other historic sites. Explore local parks, trails, and farmer's markets. Alexandria is the perfect place for big city amenities but with a small town charm. Southern Towers offers studio, one, two, and three bedroom apartment homes. Enjoy metropolitan life with views of DC and Virginia, relax in our swimming pool and stay healthy in our fitness studio. Indulge in your favorite meals with our open kitchens that offer gas ranges and a breakfast bar connected to the living area. Life is easy at the Southern Towers with on-site convenience store, dry cleaner, banking and a weekend Farmer's Market! Enjoy our complimentary coffee bar while hanging out in our clubhouse. Grab a friend and enjoy a game of tennis on our tennis courts. Entertain friends, family, and pets in our grilling or playground area. Discover Apartment Living At Its Best and reserve your home today!

Description: Beacon Hill Apartments is an Alexandra Landmark! While living at Beacon Hill Apartments you will enjoy many features and benefits. This year we have opened a BRAND NEW SPLASH PARK! We offer all utilities included in the rental rate and all new interiors for living 'green'! Live well at Beacon Hill Apartments! Beacon Hill Apartments is located on the site of a 1920's airport beacon beckoning pilots into the Washington area. Today, Beacon Hill Apartments feature the accessibility and amenities so important to your lifestyle. All homes feature abundant space that flows...for living and entertaining. All new kitchens feature color-coordinated floor coverings and fixtures as well as energy-saving appliances including microwave and ice makers. Private balconies and expansive energy-efficient windows bring the sunshine in. Best of all, our location (just off Route 1 three miles south of the Capital Beltway) guarantees the accessibility and convenience so important to modern life. We're 10 minutes from Old Towne Alexandria and National Airport, and 20 minutes from downtown Washington D.C., and the Capitol. Both metropolitan and Fairfax County buses travel through the community and link it with the Huntington Metro station, just minutes away and providing rapid transit to National Airport, Washington D.C., and suburban Maryland. Situated adjacent to Beacon Hill Apartments on one side is lovely Lenclair Park while on another side lays Beacon Mall Shopping Center. Residents at Beacon Hill Apartments also enjoy access to entertaining. Our recreational facilities include a swimming pool, tennis courts, and play areas.

Description: Enjoy a small community feel amidst big city-living. Our newly renovated apartments are conveniently located in Alexandria, right off I-395 in Fairfax County offering easy access to Washington's greatest landmarks. Convenient access to nearby I-395, I-495, and nearby Van Dorn Metro Station with Metrobus stops at the community makes both work and play convenient. Nearby shopping, dining, and entertainment are plentiful within moments at Old Town Alexandria, the Landmark Shopping Center, Fashion Centre at Pentagon City, Cameron Run Park, and downtown Washington D.C. Our location also is part of the acclaimed Fairfax County school district, where public schools have earned a reputation for being some of the best in the nation. We are the only community in the area with a complete amenity package. Not only do we allow pets, but our pet fees are among the lowest around.

Description: Enjoy the finest in Alexandria, VA apartment living at Mount Vernon Square Apartments. Garden-style, corporate furnished, and completely renovated apartments for rent are available, some featuring fireplaces, an in-home washer/dryer, and extra storage. You'll also benefit from first-class amenities, especially our 2,600-square-foot gym, swimming pool, on-site daycare, and free parking. * Located in the renowned Fairfax County School District, you will enjoy our huge playground or walking your pet in our dog park. Numerous shopping destinations, restaurants, and tourist attractions are close by, including Old Town Alexandria, National Harbor, George Washington's Mount Vernon, and the new Costco. Mount Vernon Square is minutes from DC, the Pentagon, Bolling Air Force Base, and Ft. Belvoir. With express bus service to Huntington Metro Station and convenient access to I-95 and I-495, your commute will be easy! Military discounts are available.

Description: The Strand of Alexandria is located in Alexandria, VA less just 10-miles from Washington, DC and Arlington, VA. The prime location to the nations capital affords our residents easy access to our nations most acclaimed monuments and museums, government offices and easy access to the Metro transportation system. The one and two bedroom apartments boast an array features within the apartments such as scenic views, premium cabinetry, countertops and appliances. Our residents also enjoy two-strength and cardio centers, coin free clothes care centers on every floor and the property is 2-miles from Van Dorn Metro Station. All of this combined with superior resident service, 24-hour emergency maintenance and online resident services and bill pay, all make The Strand of Alexandria to perfect place to call home.

Description: Ridgeleigh at Van Dorn are Alexandria, VA apartments that offer newly remodeled 1 and 2 bedroom homes with attached garage parking available. Each apartment is cable ready and includes washer and dryers in every home, fireplaces, ceramic tile kitchen and baths, ceiling fans, spacious closets, patio or balcony, window treatments, and attached garages available. Designer details include plush carpeting or hardwood floors, crown molding and chair rails, newly renovated kitchens and baths with stainless steel or black appliances, granite countertops, and cherry or maple cabinets. Energy efficient heating and air conditioning and pre-wired access for high speed internet are also included. Ridgeleigh at Van Dorn is a pet friendly community and features 24 hour maintenance, picnic area with grills, two free flowing swimming pools, children's playround, car wash area with hoses and vacuums, a nearly 800 square foot state of the art 24 hour fitness center, resident events and complimentary coffee. Our residents enjoy complimentary wireless access in the cyber cafe and access to a full-functioning conference room. Located within walking distance to the Van Dorn Metro Station the community offers complimentary shuttle service to save you time and protection from inclement weather. Conveniently located with easy access to major centers via I-95, I-395 and I-495 Ridgeleigh at Van Dorn is minutes away from shopping, dining, and exciting Alexandria nightlife. Washington National Airport is a quick 15 minute drive from the community. Also located near top quality schools such as Fairfax County Schools and Thomas Jefferson High School for Science and Technology. We know that each move is unique, that is why we offer our residents to choose between 2-12 month lease terms.

Description: Big City Convenience. Small Town Charm. Our offices are open 7 days a week and we are happy to host tours of our recently upgraded homes any day of the week (when it is convenient for our guests). Our location couldn't be more convenient. Kings Gardens is also conveniently located near the Old Town/Huntington Metro, which provides ultimate accessibility to the city. Convenience. Charm.

The Oaks of Woodlawn is situated in Northern Virginia amidst parks, historic and cultural attractions, bike trails, leisure activities, and nights out on the town in nearby Washington D.C. Discover easy living with all the conveniences and excitement you deserve right in the place you'll be proud to call home. Call for prices.

Description:
With its charisma and history, Old Town Alexandria is well known for having the best of everything - restaurants, stores, galleries, recreation and nightlife. By becoming a resident of The Colecroft Community, you can enjoy the best of everything ... right around the corner. Just steps to the Braddock Metro Station, 1 stop from the Ronald Reagan National Airport, 3 stops from Springfield/95 interchange and 4 short stops from the Pentagon, the townhouses and condominiums of The Colecroft Community afford you comfort, convenience and class. Treat yourself to a tour and you'll see. The Colecroft Community offers you a new standard in urban living - affordability and elegance all with convenience. 
Charming, exquisite homes are just the beginning. The Colecroft Community offers spacious 2 bedroom/2 bath condominiums, 3 bedroom/2 bath townhouses, and 3 bedroom/3 bath townhouses with den. Quality features include custom eat-in kitchens with warm oak cabinetry; state-of-the art General Electric appliances including microwave ovens, flat top stoves along with a washer and dryer in every unit; elegant hardwoods; wood burning fireplace; ceramic tile baths; custom carpeting; abundant closet space and state-of-the art security availability.
Luxury amenities continue throughout The Colecroft Community from the well-equipped exercise facility to the captivating party room and adjacent garden available for your private entertaining. Add the convenience of garage parking, only available with select units, and an array of retail shops conveniently located on the street level.
You can have it all - Comfort, Convenience, and Style.
Come join us for the convenience and prestige of luxury living at The Colecroft Community located in Old Town Alexandria, Virginia.

Description: One-of-a-kind newly renovated 931SF 1BR & 1.5BA two-story loft style condo featuring 20-foot ceilings and sunny 300SF patio in the heart of Old Town! (**Can be offered furnished upon request**) One of the most desirable units in building facing private courtyard. Remote control roller shades, walk-in closet, custom lighting, new bathrooms. Access to every amenity at your doorstep: Whole Foods just two blocks away, Starbucks across the street, King Street Metro a 5-minute walk; with dry cleaning, convenience store, restaurants, salon, and a post office all in the building. Garage parking, gym and pool facilities all available in this building voted Alexandria’s best condo complex for 2017.

Description: Stratford on the Potomac; Stratford Landing - Harbour Point. Property is located on a secluded cul-de-sac lot over 1/3 acre on George Washington's River Farm. Easy commute to Ft Belvoir (3 miles) and/or Pentagon (12 miles); Customized Wellington Colonial (fully remodeled fall 2006); 4,043 sq. ft. overall (1,012 sq. ft. completely finished basement); 5 (6) beds; 5-1/2 baths; Dual Carrier HVAC (16 and 14 SEER); Hardiplank (concrete composite) siding and brick veneer; Maintenance free Azek board trim exterior; Oversized leaf free gutter system; Copper flashing on new asphalt roofing system; New electrical inside and out (switches, plugs, fixtures, etc.); Completely retrofitted with modern cable and phone system throughout; Wired for a security system; Front porch shed roof and rear basement steps shed roof w/ bead-board underside; New red oak wood flooring 1st and 2nd floors; All new windows and sliders by Loewen (2 bay windows (master and breakfast); Master bath skylight; Large sun/media/dinning multi-purpose room; New Toto (6) toilets; New American (4) bathtubs; New KitchenAid SS appliances (double oven, dishwasher, microwave, gas range, and Superba refrigerator/freezer in oversized country kitchen); Silestone quartz counters (kitchen, upstairs laundry and basement wet bar); optional Hale Security pet door, in basement, ... additional $1,000.00 pet deposit required, if you have up to two dogs maximum.

Description:
FEATURES:
* 	All hardwood floors. Ceramic floor tiling and stainless appliances in kitchen with tile backsplash. Italian cabinets
* 	All appliances to include washer and dryer in the unit.
* 	2 Large bedrooms
* 	Jacuzzi in Master with shower 
* 	2 Full Baths, Master Bath has two sinks. Guest bath has walk-in glass shower
* 	Over 1,400 square feet. Walk-out balcony
* 	Custom roman shades in living room
* 	24 hour security with concierge service
* 	Unit has a secure parking spaces available right by the entrance to floor(2nd available)
* 	Storage unit 4 feet by 6 feet available to rent
* 	Unit is located directly above the Internet Cafe so you can access the free wireless from the condo unit
* 	Swimming Pool and Gym located on the 7th floor with beautiful view of Masonic Temple and TVs on exercise equipment, Party room and pool table
* 	Small pets allowed for $300 deposit
* 	One month deposit required. However, offer a military allowance

Description:
Beautiful House for Rent - Walk to Huntington Metro
Location: GREAT Location next to Huntington Metro, 1 minute walk to metro across the street. Minutes to Old Town Alexandria. Walk to restaurants and shops. Easy access to 495 and Richmond Hwy. 15 minute drive to National Airport, easy drive to Ft. Belvoir.
House:Fenced Yard. Completely remodeled delightful home! 3 Level duplex townhouse, 3 bedrooms, 2 full baths, finished basement with new elegant bathroom with tiled shower. Large new kitchen with modern stainless steel appliances, wood cabinets and granite counters. Central Heating & AC, full size washer and dryer. Excellent American Cherry hardwood floors throughout. 1 car parking in property front driveway, additional street parking.
Utilities:Not included. Tenant is responsible for the utilities
No pets allowed
Term:One year lease required. One month's security deposit
Availability: Available for rent August 1, 2017
Rent:$2,450 / Month
$30 Application fee per person (waived with signed lease)
Please email us if you are interested.

Description:
Olde Town Alexandria $1,550 Walk the cobblestone streets of historic Olde Town, One bedroom airy second floor unit with hardwood flooring. Very quite, shaded, secure coded entrance. Hard-wooded living room, bedroom and entrance hall, overlooking landscaped garden. Kitchen: ceramic floors, granite top counter, all the appliances you will need. Pool, Off Street Parking (one tag assigned per unit) additional storage space, laundry in separate area, bike storage, transportation to DC and Arlington at door. Enjoy convenient shopping, fine dining to quick food all nearby. Condominium fees included. 
Additional:
Gas $10.00+- month
Electric $50.00+- month
$50.00 move in/out fee
One month deposit plus first month rent due upon signing.
OPEN HOUSE NEXT WEEKEND 10/7/17 PLEASE CONTACT IF INTERESTED IN ATTENDING

Description:
Scenic-View Condo two bedroom with Den, 2 bath, Utilities included, 10 Min. From DC! Freshly painted.
Ideal for new family or share!
Available mid-August
Enjoy a cool drink while you sit on your 14th floor patio overlooking a scenic sky view of the city and park below.
The location is ideal with nearby shopping..including starbucks and restaurants within walking distance.
Or a short drive will get you to the entertainment centers of Old Towne Alexandria.
10 minutes from Pentagon / Crystal City and Downtown DC.
7 Minutes to Fort Myer or Mark Center
20 Minutes to Fort Belvoir going away from rush hour traffic!
-1050 Square feet.
-Lots of closet space
-Swimming Pool and Party Room
-Laundry facilities on the same floor
-On Premise security and key fob access to lobby
-Tons of FREE On Premise parking
-Bus Stop in front of building (takes you straight to Pentagon Metro Station)
All utilities are included (gas, electricity, AC/heat and hot water)
- Cable and Phone are NOT included.
The condominium complex has a drycleaning shop, convenience store, dental clinic and pediatric clinic (great if you have kids!)

Description:
Sunny and Spacious, Furnished Apt., Near King St. metro: 
Newly updated, 2 bedroom, 2 bath apartment with more than 1100 sq. ft. of move-in ready living space. Open floor plan including: spacious kitchen, private balcony, large bedrooms, walk-in closets, washer/dryer. Fully furnished with recliner sofas, a 50" HDTV and blue-ray DVD player, queen bed set and home office with fold-down sofa/ bed. Most utilities included.
Reserved parking spot and spots for guests or additional cars. The complex includes a beautiful pool, tennis court, and community room. Walk to the King St. metro, Amtrak, and buses, plus easy access to the beltway at Telegraph Rd. Nearby shops and restaurants on Duke St., King St., the Carslyle District, and Old Town.

Pet Policy: Dogs and Cats Allowed

Description:
Contemporary 1 bedroom apartment in a garden-style condominium. Non smoking. $1525 per month. Minimum 1 year lease. Available November 12th. Pet friendly (cats preferred). New windows and balcony slider installed in May 2017!
https://washingtondc.craigslist.org/nva/apa/d/contemporary-1br-ba-available/6325703603.html
Location: 3340 S 28th Street, Alexandria, VA 22302
Cross Street: King Street 
715 sq feet plus large balcony. New windows and slider door. Full-size washer/dryer. Stainless steel appliances. Recessed lighting throughout. Contemporary kitchen with granite countertops. Pergo floors. Custom Elfa closets. Secure building with call box. Convenient fob access. Storage included. One reserved parking space + guest hang tag included. All utilities included except electric (averages $40 per month). Condominium amenities include beautifully renovated pool and pool house, playground, grills, and brand new private dog park (opened September 1st). 
Rent includes water, trash/recycling, snow removal, reserved parking, on-site building manager, etc. Available semi-furnished. 
Three blocks to 395, Fairlington/Shirlington and tons of shopping centers.
Four blocks to DoD-BRAC-133/Alexandria's Mark Center. 
Close to Pentagon, DC and Old Town Alexandria.
Public transportation: Metrobus 7a/b/c/e/f/y to Pentagon Metro Station.

Pet Policy: Dogs and Cats Allowed

Three-blocks from the Braddock Road Metro - travel door-to-door in just 30 minutes (to downtown DC). Walking distance to King Street! All of the amenities of urban and suburban living. Old Town at an affordable price!
Fully renovated townhome near Braddock Metro. Features include hardwood floors, living room w/built in bookcases and fireplace, separate dining room, kitchen w/stainless appliances, granite counters and ample cabinetry, gas heat & cooking, private enclosed patio and more.

Description:
Stunning Contemporary Residence- New York Style 2 Level Condo - tons of light - bright and airy. All Utilities Included in Rent. Spacious living - dining room with hardwood floors and 2 sliding glass doors that open to huge patio - perfect for entertaining and al fresco dining. Large master suite with space for desk or sitting area. 943 sq. ft. total. Excellent Building Amenities: Fitness center, party room, renovated lobby, new pool, tennis courts, 24-hr front desk, secure entrance, picnic area, Metro bus to Pentagon out front, 1 block to shopping center.
* Available 10/1/17
* Min. 1 year lease 
* Rent includes all utilities 
* No pets 
* No smoking 
* $50 application fee per adult on Lease (non-refundable) 
* Security deposit: equal to one months rent (refundable) 
* 1 assigned parking space included (C-107) + 1 visitor parking pass 
* Move-in fee: $100 (non-refundable) 
* Elevator deposit: $60 (refundable)

Pet Policy: Dogs Allowed

Description: Beautiful, airy, well-situated 975 sq ft 2 br/1 bath top floor condo in park-like, secluded and private setting near Old Town Alexandria. Double vanity bath, updated kitchen with granite, stainless steel shelves and appliances, lots of cabinet space and pantry, W/D, top-floor corner unit, skylights in kitchen and living room, balcony, secure building, parking, mature trees and landscaping, extra storage, party room, gym, BBQ grills and picnic area, dog-friendly (no more than two), animal hosp/vet within ¼ mile. Playground/park across street. Walk to trails, parks, playgrounds, shopping. Nearby Giant, Trader Joes, Whole Foods, Old Town, Pentagon, Fort Belvoir, Fort Myers, Mark Center, hospital, banks, movie theaters, shopping, drugstores, Macarthur Elem. Centrally located community, minutes to 495, 95, 395, Route 1, and GW Parkway. Walk to King Street Metro in 20 minutes or walk 5 minutes to bus to King St/Eisenhower/Braddock Metros, VRE, Amtrak. Walk to Old Town, waterfront, or Del Ray in 30 minutes or less. Gas, water, hot water, trash and recycling, snow removal, one permit parking space included in rent. Plenty of parking onsite for guests. Tenant responsible for electric, cable or DSL, telephone charges. Credit check/application ($50.00). Available mid-September 2017. Please get in touch if you are interested in this unique condo rental.

Description: 15 minute walk to King Street Metro and Old Town Alexandria shops and restaurants. Immediate access to Telegraph Road and 495. Spacious 2 bedroom, 2 full bath with sunken living and dining area; approximately 1200 square feet. Bright eat-in kitchen and private balcony with sweeping views of Alexandria. Ample storage and closet space; washer and dryer in unit; free parking, tennis, and swimming pool. Available November 3rd.

Description:
Upstairs master bedroom in shared house.
Nestled in well-established safe and friendly neighborhood. Waking distance to Huntington Metro station as well as Bob and Edith's Diner (a local favorite) and shops, restaurants and park. 
Private room and shared bathroom. 
Shared kitchen and entrance. 
Shared laundry. Big backyard, front porch and back deck. 
Fantastic whole house living for a fraction of city prices.
6 month lease also available; larger deposit required. Please ask.

Description:
Beautiful Luxury Condo: 
Hardwood floors
Geo-Thermal heating 
Quartz Countertops (kitchen)
Marble Countertops (bathrooms)
Sub-Zero & Kitchen Aid Stainless Steel Appliances 
Induction cooktop
Conduction and Convention oven
LED lighting
9' ceilings
Crown Molding
Bedroom ceiling fans
Front loading washer and dryer
2 underground parking spaces and storage locker. 
Oversized windows
Keyless entry, 
Digital and manual locks, 
Wireless accessible thermostat.
3 work-out facilities
2 Rooftop decks with grills
Located in the historic district of Old Town Alexandria. Walking distance to Braddock Metro, Waterfront and King Street.

Description:
This two-level (+ basement) house is at an ideal location two blocks from King Street's shops and restaurants and a few minutes walk from Whole Foods, Safeway, Potomac River, Metro (or 1 min from the Dash Bus stop) and the biking/hiking paths. Located near the juncture of Duke and South Columbus, the residence has its own off-street parking space and permitted on-street parking is available to residents from the city. But you don't need a car to live at or commute from this location. 
Hardwood floors throughout, master bed has walk-in closet and separate bath. Lots of closet space and sunlight at this residence - a well-proportioned layout for Old Town. Additional space in finished basement gives you a little bit more room to hobby, read, or hang out. Cozy, low-maintenance yard. Social, friendly neighbors make it a great place to live.
Minimum 1 yr. lease at posted rent.
If interested send us an email and we can arrange a time. Thanks.

Pet Policy: Dogs and Cats Allowed

Description:
Updated, bright, corner 1-bedroom in A+ Old Town location. Just four blocks south of King Street, less than 1 block from transportation, grocery, etc. Adjacent to Wilkes Street Tunnel - perfect for jogging or biking along the Potomac River, just three blocks away!
Apartment has working wood fireplace and sparkling hardwood floors. Washer / dryer in unit and full appliance package (fridge, range, dishwasher, garbage disposal) in kitchen. 12-unit complex has amazing, unique tenant courtyard - a must see! Unlike anything else in Old Town. 
Professional Management.

Description:
Second floor, very bright corner apartment with private balcony and private entrance off South Royal Street. Apartment features brand new carpet, full appliance package including fridge, dishwasher, electric range and garbage disposal. Stacked washer/dryer in apartment. Various upgrades throughout the apartment including new ceiling fan, new bathroom hardware/lighting, new electrical outlets and switches, new granite kitchen counters, sink/faucet and lighting in kitchen. Ample closet space including walk-in closet. The common area tenant courtyard oozes with charm and is filled with mature trees, dining tables, gas grill, etc.
$1,950/month rent. $750 security deposit. $40 non-refundable application fee. Tenant pays most utilities. High-speed internet available. Non-smoking building. Professional management. Pets allowed with pet fee and rent and size/breed restrictions.
Literally steps away from Safeway and less than 5-minute walk from dozens of other shops and restaurants. Adjacent to the old S. Wilkes Street railway tunnel which provides direct access to Windmill Hill Park, the Potomac River, running and biking trails. 
WalkScore (R)  - 95 "Walker's Paradise" 
TransitScore (R)  - 53 "Good Transit" 
BikeScore (R)  - 87 "Very Bikeable" 
Less than 1 Block from DASH Bus Route to King Street Metro Station. 1.1 Miles / 20 minute walk to King Street Metro Station. Less than 1 Block from Capital BikeShare station.
Very convenient to Old Town Alexandria, U.S. Patent & Trademark Office, Federal Courthouse, GW Parkway, I-495, Reagan National Airport, Crystal City, Pentagon City, the Pentagon and Downtown D.C.

Pet Policy: No Pets Allowed

Description:
UTILITIES INCLUDED! Enjoy the privacy of this gorgeous sunny studio apartment! Excellent location just minutes away from Washington DC, blue ad yellow line metro stations, and major highways. Plenty of street parking. Walking distance to local shops and restaurants. Total privacy as you will not be sharing a wall with anyone else. 
About the apartment
- A private in-law suite above the detached garage of a townhouse
- Furnished with a queen sized bed, chair, desk, dresser, TV.
- Kitchenette equipped with microwave, refrigerator, counter-top oven and cooktop.
- Washer/dryer combo in unit
- Full bath
- Private entrance
About the location
- 2 miles away from DCA airport, 5-8 min drive, $8 Uber ride.
- 1 mile away from Braddock Road metro, 2 miles from Crystal City metro (blue and yellow lines).
- Steps away from the Metroway bus stop that takes you to either Braddock Road or Crystal City metro station
- 10-15 min drive to Washington DC
- walking distance to the Del Ray neighborhood where you can find local shops, coffee shops, restaurants, yoga and crossfit studios.
- A number of grocery stores nearby: Giant, Target, Whole Foods, MOMs, and Aldi.
Application and rental requirements
- No smoking, no drugs, no weapons.
- Single occupancy only. No regular overnight visitors.
- No pets
- Minimum income requirement 40 times monthly rent
- Tenant verification with background check and credit report required
- Employment verification required
- Application fee $30 (non-refundable)
- Refundable security deposit (one month's rent)

Pet Policy: Dogs and Cats Allowed

Description: Newly renovated condo 2bdrm. 1.5bath, hardwood floors throughout with chair and crown molding, galley style kitchen with stainless steel appliances and a pantry. Walk-out patio. Comes with 2 free parking spots and lots of available visitor parking for guests. Some utilities included. Condo community has large pool and playground. Located right off of 395 and close to metro. Dogs/cats allowed with monthly pet fee.

Description:
Beautiful townhouse in Kingstowne, Alexandria on a cul-de-sac, backing to woods with total privacy! It's a completely above ground three level townhouse with one car garage and a long driveway. Huge master bedroom with a SITTING AREA and a spacious WALK-IN closet! Master bathroom has dual sink and Jacuzzi tub and a shower stall! Upper level has two more bedrooms and a full bath. OVERSIZE windows all across let lots of sunlight in! 
Middle level has a spacious living room, family room, sitting area backing to woods, open layout kitchen, powder room and a spacious deck.
Lower level (above ground) has a spacious rec room, full bathroom, storage room and a garage. Rec room can be used as a forth bedroom. Lots of light, wide window and a patio door that opens to back yard.
Great neighborhood and an excellent school district!
Kingstowne living is the best! Enjoy free access (included in the rent) to two swimming pools and two different gyms!
Less than a mile away from Wegmans and market place! 
Pets are allowed upon approval.
Please call directly at 703-328-3229 to take a look at the house.

Pet Policy: Dogs and Cats Allowed

Description: True loft style apartments in the heart of Old Town Alexandria. The old school charm combined with refined finishes make The Mill a one of a kind apartment building. The apartments have wood floors, exposed brick walls and 10ft to 12ft ceilings. Walk to shopping, restaurants, bars, metro and waterfront. The Mill also offers fully furnished apartments for short and long term rentals. These apartments not only look great but also allow you to only write one check a month for your living expenses. Ask about our free member ship to The Agency down the street! The best co-working space in town!

Monthly Fees:
* Cat Rent: $25
* Dog Rent: $30
* Electricity, Air Conditioning: Included
One Time Fees:
* Admin Fee: $150
* Application Fee: $50
* Dog Deposit: $250
Pet Policy:
Dogs Allowed:
Cats and dogs are welcome. Maximum two pets per apartment. Monthly fees: $25 per cat. Non-refundable fee: $250 (first pet only). Monthly fees: $30 per dog. Non-refundable fee: $250 (first pet only). Breed restrictions and other limitations apply. 
* $250 Deposit
* $30 Monthly Pet Rent
* 200 lb Weight Limit

* Close to express bus service

* Extra storage included
* Newly renovated kitchens in select apts
* On-site Parking
* Package receiving
* Patio in select apartments
Features:
* High Speed Internet Access

* Tub/Shower
Lease Info: 2 months, 3 months, 4 months, 5 months, 6 months, 7 months, 8 months, 9 months, 10 months, 11 months, 12 months
Services:

Description: Welcome home to the southern charm and warmth of Braddock Lee Apartments in Alexandria, VA. These apartments for rent near Fairlington and the Washington, DC Metro area feature all the modern conveniences you desire, seamlessly blended with colonial architecture reminiscent of years gone by. Our studio, one-, and two-bedroom apartments have modern cook's kitchens and ceramic-tile bathrooms, in addition to scenic courtyards. Braddock Lee Apartments is also conveniently accessible to our nation's capital. Your commute is made even easier with nearby access to I-95, I-395, State Route 7, and three Metro Stations. Just eight miles from the DC line, you'll be to work at the Pentagon and other DC buildings in no time! When work is done, have some fun in upscale Shirlington Village and nearby Old Town Alexandria, VA, a true shopper's paradise that offers a delightful mix of shops and restaurants.

Description: Situated just off U.S. Route 1, Abbotts Run allows for easy access to I-95, the Fairfax County Parkway, Washington, Maryland and Old Town Alexandria. The community is just moments from Fort Belvoir and is the perfect choice for those seeking off base housing. We invite you to visit us today to learn more about Abbotts Run.

Description: In the heart of historic Alexandria, The Fields of Alexandria puts you right in the middle of it all. Surrounded by shopping and dining, The Fields of Alexandria offers you everything you want close to home. Enjoy a central location minutes to I-395 Catch the bus to the nearby King Street Metro Visit historic Old Town Alexandrias restaurants, museums and waterfront parks Find exceptional shopping and entertainment at Landmark and Springfield Malls There is nothing quite as wonderful as coming home after a long day. At The Fields of Alexandria, this is truer than ever before. Because here you will find a home full of comfort. A home that is designed to enrich your life while meeting your needs. Perhaps the first thing you notice is the way light flows freely from room to room, brightening every space. Then, there is the sense of relaxation, found in everything from the open designs to the great features, such as: Plush, wall-to-wall carpeting Generous closet space Gas heat and hot water Thoughtfully designed kitchen with a full complement of modern appliances Washers and dryers available Your home is your sanctuary and showroom. A place to rest quietly and a place to host friends. No matter your needs and no matter how they may change, you?ll find the home that is perfect for you at The Fields of Alexandria. The comforts of The Fields of Alexandria stretch far beyond your home. In fact, when you live here, you will find yourself surrounded by great amenities designed to help you enjoy more of every day. You will have: Refreshing pool Learning center On-site playground Cats and large dogs welcome

Description: There's nothing like the confidence you feel every moment of every day when you know you're in the right place at the right time. People can see it in the way you walk, the way you look and especially the way you live. It started the moment you moved into your spacious, designer-renovated apartment at Bennington Crossings. From the exceptional array of features and amenities to the perfect Alexandria location, we're confident you're going to love our apartments. Welcome to Bennington Crossings. Welcome home.

* Cat Rent: $35
* Dog Rent: $35

* Application Fee: $50
* Cat Fee: $500
* Dog Fee: $500
Pet Policy:
Dogs and Cats Allowed
Woof! Meow! Please see Leasing consultant for breed restrictions. 
* $35 Monthly Pet Rent
* $500 Fee
* 2 Pet Limit

Description: LEASE TODAY AND SAVE UP TO 1 MONTH FREE + $500 GIANT GROCERY GIFT CARD!* Experience luxury apartment living in Alexandria, VA. Sleek, modern residences, including studios, 1 bedroom and 2 bedrooms. Inspired amenities, such as a well-appointed courtyard with swimming pool and a fitness center with personal trainer and group classes. Enjoy a Potomac Yard location that makes getting around quick and easy. Shift life into a higher gear at Notch 8.

* Dog Deposit: $300
Pet Policy:
Dogs Allowed:
Cats and Dogs Warmly Welcomed. $300 pet fee $30/pet rent per month. Renters Insurance is required for dogs. * Maximum of 2 pets per apartment with a maximum combined weight of 80lbs. The following breeds of dogs are not permitted to be kept as pets on the premises, or brought onto same premises to visit at any time: * Akitas, Alaskan Malamutes, American Staffordshire Terriers, American Pit bull terriers, Bull Terriers, Chow Chows, Doberman Pinschers, Dogo Argentino, Fila Brasilerios, German Shepherds, Great Danes, Japanese Tosas, Miniature Bull Terriers, Pit Bulls, Presa Canarios, Rottweilers, Siberian Huskies, Staffordshire Bull Terriers, Wolf Hybrids, Wild Dogs or any partial breed dog that has one or more of the previously mentioned breeds in its lineage. Breed restrictions apply

PLEASE PARK IN VISITOR SPOTS!

Description: Light-filled end-unit townhouse w/ elevator! Newly constructed w/ stunning finishes throughout: Snaidero cabinetry Thermador appliances Waterworks fixtures Caesarstone counters gas fireplace w/ marble surround & hardwood throughout. Marble in master bath & powder room. 2-car garage & rear yard w/ privacy fence. Unbeatable Old Town location a few blocks to King St Trader Joe s & waterfront!

Description: Great condo in a highly-desirable location! This spacious and renovated 3 bedroom and 2 bathroom unit includes all utilities except for electricity. There is a nice balcony on which to enjoy your favorite beverage or the trees. The complex has a pool a gym and a convenience store. There is a FREE shuttle service to the Metro station and two parking passes. Close to Old Town DC and the Beltway.

Laundry room is next to the kitchen on the main level Rent includes ALL utilities

Kitchen:
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Eat-in Kitchen
* Microwave
* Oven
* Range
* Refrigerator

Description: Great Value! Private top floor condo. Spacious 1 bedroom model with over 680 sf. Bright and sunny with courtyard views and loaded with features. Walk-in closets and assigned parking. Relax on the large balcony. Condo fee includes all the utilities except electric. Excellent amenities pool & more! Option to rent furnished too with little extra rate.

Features:
* Washer/Dryer
* Air Conditioning
* Ceiling Fans
* Fireplace

Description: ALL UTILITIES included in rent. Beautiful and very Spacious one Bedroom condo in a Luxury Building. Hard to find such a large 849 sq.ft. unit. Nice and bright with wonderful parquet floors and updates throughout(including new windows and light fixtures). Recently painted. Great exercise room pool and party room. Super location near metros restaurants and shopping. Bus Stop near front door.

Description: Roommate needed to share a 2BR and 2Bath condominium. This is well maintained condo w/hardwood floors. Great location walks to Land Mark Mall shopping plaza banks and B.J s store. The apartment is located one exit from National Harbor and MGM at National Harbor. It is also 1.5 miles away from the Van Dorn Metro station. Very close to the fames Old town Alexandria.

The home you don t want to miss!

Description: Stunning renovations w/custom kitchen & Baths! 2 master suites is perfect for guests/roommates/home office. Great open floorplan w/light from the Encl Bal (104 sqft not incl in 1 087 sqft) thru LR DR & Kit. New wood floors in main areas. Only pay electric phone & cable. 1 garage & storage. Enjoy Carlyle s pool 2 gyms tennis putt green 24hr security etc. Blocks to Metro Movies shops&restaurants.

Description: Avail late October. Lovely Franklin Model 3BR/2.5BA garage townhouse located in the best spot in Cameron Station! Backing to green space & just steps to the pool gym basketball court party room day care restaurant coffee shop & 52-acre park! Free morning & evening shuttle to Metro plus easy Metro bus to Pentagon make this a slam dunk! Well maintained. Pets case by case. Parking for 2 cars.

Description: SHORT TERM CONSIDERED A Gem. Charming renovated 3-4 home. Quiet neighborhood. Walk to King St metro & Old Town . Renovated kit & baths. SS appliances & granite counters. Delightful screened porch. HW main levels. Finished basement & storage rm. OFF SP & 1-car garage. Enjoy third acre (lawn care included). MacArthur school district. Pets on case-by-case basis. No more than 2 incomes to qualify.

Description: Across the street from Kingstowne Town center so everything you need is easy to access. This top floor unit offers bright and quiet living. The open staircase to the master suite makes this home feel more like a house than a condo. Back patio faces the trees for more quiet enjoyment. Easy commuter access and use of pool/fitness available. What more could you want in a place to call home?

Description: Gorgeous move in ready townhouse has it all. New paint throughout new carpets beautiful hardwood floors. Close to Ft. Belvoir Mount Vernon and Old Town. Private patio area in back. Huge walk in closet in master bedroom and large bathroom with a soaking tub and shower. Lots of natural light and open floor plan. 1 car garage. Lower level has large rec room and den with fireplace. Backs to trees.

Call to schedule time to view.

Description: Wonderful light filled 2 level condo in the heart of Old Town. This 2 bed/2 bath has an open floor plan with a large gourmet kitchen and separate dining room area. You can enjoy our own private outdoor space off the living room. Both bedrooms are spacious and have en-suite bathrooms. Minutes to King Street Metro and all that Old Town has to offer. Assigned parking space. 2 hour notice please.

GRANITE COUNTERS STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES BEAUTIFUL VIEWS OF ALEXANDRIA SKYLINE. ONE GARAGE PARKING INCLUDED. BUILDING HAS LOTS OF AMENITIES 24 HR FITNESS CENTER PARTY ROOM POOL LOUNGE. JUST MINUTES FROM I-495/95.

Description: Spacious 2 bedroom condo in popular Canal Place with a wood burning fireplace. Bright & airy 2nd floor unit with a Juliet balcony. Light-filled kitchen. (Kitchen floor to be replaced) Stackable washer & dryer in the unit. Community pool extra storage & reserved off-street parking. Close to everything Old Town has to offer. Tenants packing.

Entertaining in the private back yard on the gorgeous brick patio will be enjoyable for all your parties. Bathrooms have been updated and the main level has hardwood floors with laminate on lower lvl.Plenty of storage with a floored attic and a shed behind the house.

Description: Contemporary studio with partitions that define living areas kitchen-dining along wall of glass balcony outside. Living with separator to bedroom area w/ built-in shelving. All hardwood floors furnished with large screen TV sofa dining table bed. Modern kitchen & bath with granite counters glass sink in bath stacked W/D in unit. Walk to Metro Whole Foods Old Town pool & courtyard.

Features:
* Washer/Dryer
* Air Conditioning
* Ceiling Fans
* Fireplace

Description: Bright & clean 3-level Townhouse backs to trees/ very private in back. Hardwoods in living/dining on main level Upgraded windows carpet on top and lwr levels.Gourmet kitchen with stainless granite ceramic tile floor. Master has vaulted ceiling 2 closets Lower level has rec-room full guest bath laundry room w/storage. Large 2-level deck fenced lower level deck. Close to Metro & shopping .

Kitchen:
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Ice Maker
* Microwave
* Oven
* Refrigerator

Description: Great location great price. Cozy fireplace in large rec-room. Spacious living room roomy kitchen with plenty of cabinet and counter space. Two master bedrooms plus two more ample bedrooms with plenty of closet space. Nice deck and patio for seasonal fun. Convenient to metro bus shops DC National Harbor & parks. Minutes to 495 95 395 Pentagon old town Alexandria & other points of interest.

Description: Wonderful 2-lvl top-flr condo w/3BRs high vaulted ceilings wood floors in the foyer & KIT & more! Beautiful KIT has some SS apps breakfast nook & a pass-through to DR w/door to the balcony. LR includes gas fplce & recessed lights. MBR has huge walk-in & MBA w/sep shower & soaking tub. 3rd BR in upper lvl w/private BA. W/D in unit. Moments to I-495 & Van Dorn Street Metro!

Description: Lovely one bedroom apartment on the top floor of a three story building on a quiet tree lined street in historic Fairlington. Pools and tennis courts are very close by. Washer/dryer are in the unit. Easy access to 395 Alexandria Arlington DC and the lively Shirlington area with dining entertainment and much more. Pets on case by case basis.

Description: Immaculate and completely renovated end unit townhouse in prime commuter location in Alexandria City. 3 full bedrooms upstairs 3.5 baths and bonus 4th bedroom on lower level. new appliances. private brick enclosed back patio.Close to schools shopping and Mark Center. Best biggest end unit in subdivision

Description: Gorgeous brick-front end-unit TH with 3BRs all w/vaulted ceilings a 2-car garage backs to trees & is located only minutes to the Town Center! Newer water heater & washer/dryer and recently refinished hardwoods. Totally updated kitchen granite counters stainless appliances 42-inch cabinets & overhang for bar stool seating. Great outdoor space w/upper deck & fenced-in pavered patio.

Description: Light and Bright 1 bedroom 1 bath condo in Gated community. Update kitchen with granite countertops. Hardwood floors in Living room and carpet in bedroom. This is one of the bigger 1 bedroom units in the community. Large balcony with additional enclosed storage. Community Swimming pool designated garage space & visitor pass. Minutes from shopping & Restaurants Community Shuttle to Metro.

Description: Terrific brick-front TH backing to trees in Kingstowne! Spacious LR w/2 windows & crown molding. Sep DR. Kit has Corian counters a deep sink ceramic tile floors & a door to a lovely brick patio & fenced rear yard. MBR has a vaulted ceiling ceiling fan & luxury MBA w/a skylight & sep tub & shower. LL has rec rm w/a fplc a full BA & a large storage area!

Kitchen:
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Ice Maker
* Microwave
* Oven
* Range
* Refrigerator
* Freezer
Features:
* Washer/Dryer
* Air Conditioning
* Ceiling Fans
* Fireplace

Description: TH w/wooded views & great location bet DC & Belvoir! Freshly painted/12 crown molding/wainscoting/plantation blinds/tray ceil/new hdwds main level/new carpet! Gas fpl! Kit-maple cab w/wine rack/granite/gas cktop/SS appl! Sep lvl MBR with custom WIC/sit rm/lux MBA w/sep tub/shw. 4 ceil fans/sprinkler sys/sec sys/wall safe. No pets: No smokers. No more than 2 incomes to qualify.

Description: Open Bright and Cheery Large Elegant End Unit Town home with spacious 2 Car Garage! Gleaming Hardwood Floors Throughout The Main Level! Lovely Deck! Stainless Kitchen Appliances! 2 Gas Fireplaces! Stone Patio! Great Location! Right at I395! Cathedral Ceilings! Close to wonderful restaurants and shopping! This is a lovely home that won t last!

Description: Centrally located in the heart of old town this spacious condo offers a bright and sunny open floorplan. Renovated kitchen and bath.Large balcony for outdoor entertaining off living room. Hardwood floors throughout. Built in bookcases. Walk to everything and close to major commuter routes metro. Parking garage next door.

Cherry hardwood floors throughout updated kitchen with walnut cabinets Corian countertops stainless appliances. Even a balcony overlooking the outdoor pool and hot tub. Updated bathroom walk in closet washer/dryer in unit.

Description: Great studio conveniently located in the Heart of Old Town! Walking distance to Metro Restaurants Shops and Bars.....Great Walkability. Spacious Open Floor Plan. Large 8 1/2 walk-in closet for plenty of storage. ALL UTILITIES INCLUDED. Building includes: Parking 24-hour front desk roof top deck overlooking Potomac River WIFI Room/Internet Caf . Can also be offered furnished.

Kitchen:
* Dishwasher
* Disposal
* Ice Maker
* Microwave
* Oven

Description: Beautiful sunsets and great views from the enclosed balcony convey with this spacious 2 BR and den unit (could be 3rd BR) 1 525 sq.ft. ample closets & fresh paint. Amenities include garage parking swimming pools - in and out tennis courts bowling alley convenience store and easy access to metro .Quick commute to Old Town Nat. Airport and DC and just minutes to the Woodrow Wilson Bridge.

Sliding glass doors from living room to private patio. Washer/dryer in unit. Reserved parking. Some utilities included. Pool & tennis in community. HUGE SPACIOUS ROOMS BRIGHT SUNNY WINDOWS. LOTS OF CLOSETS AND STORAGE. FULLY FENCED SIDE AND BACK YARD. AMAZING LOCATION: CLOSE TO I-395 METRO AND COMMUTER BUS. PETS CASE-BY-CASE WITH DEPOSIT. COMMUNITY POOL PLAYGROUND TENNIS COURT.

Description: Calling all commuters--Location location! Steps to metro & quick access to 495. Spacious 3 level townhouse with 2 car garage. Main level features large living room with courtyard views dining area kitchen w/table space family room adjoins kitchen & leads to deck. Huge great room on entrance/lower level. Master suite: sep shower soaking tub & his & her walk-in closets. Laundry on bedroom level.

Description:
(202) 965-4800 - Spacious Corner-End Ground Unit 2BR/1BA $1500/ month includes utilities - Spacious corner-end 2BR/1BA apartment offers a renovated and updated kitchen and bathroom, a walk-in closet, and hardwood floors throughout, and an airy sun-lit patio that opens to the living room. Accessible from both the internal weather-protected entrance and outdoor patio level entrance, the unit also features free parking in a private lot and is only a 2 minute walk to mass transit.
Included in rent: utilities, central a/c, laundry room & storage unit next door to unit, parking permits for off street parking, swimming pool passes. Security deposit equal to one month's rent & 1st month's rent due at lease signing. Move in fee is $50.00. All adult occupants must have a FICO score of 650 or higher. Contact Lou Costanza at Lcostanza@costanzaandchan.com or 202-745-0613 to set up a showing.
(RLNE3596302) Other Amenities - Other- storage unit, laundry room next door, Pool. Details regarding this property's Utilities - Heat Included, Electricity Included, Gas Included, Water Included, Trash Pick-up Included.

Description:
(202) 965-4800 - 3 bed 2 1/2 bath in Cameron Station, Alexandria, VA - This home in popular, convenient Cameron Station has been well maintained and shows well! Fabulous Interior, Hardwood Floors, Custom Built ins, Beautiful molding, gas fireplace, private master suite with vaulted ceilings, walk in closet & spa bath. Large 2 car garage. Extra storage, great community amenities including pool & fitness center, playgrounds and more. Cat warmly welcomed with a one time pet fee. Email lcostanza@costanzaandchan.com to schedule a showing today!
(RLNE3595685) Pet policies - Cats Allowed.

The main level offers half bathroom and washer/dryer. The upper level features open air bedroom, full bathroom and enormously large closets.
Please email Scott Goldberg to Scott@StreamlineManagement.com to see this great home.

Description:
(703) 330-1776 - 4 Bedroom End Unit Townhouse - Alexandria - Distinguished, all brick end unit townhome in Alexandria. Over 2,700 sqft on 3 levels; 4 bedrooms, 3.5 baths, 2 living spaces & formal dining. Spacious Kitchen w/SS appliances, hardwood & tile throughout main AND upper levels! 2 parking spaces. HUGE Master Suite w/his & her closets! Private, rear courtyard sanctuary w/extensive hardscape & furniture! Across the street from Park/Nature Center for jogging/recreation. Near 395, transportation, shopping & restaurants.
Tenant is responsible for all utilities, interior and exterior maintenance, and renter's insurance. Pets considered (under 30 lbs.) on a case-by-case basis with a strong application, additional pet deposit, & monthly pet rent. Not participating with Section 8.
Home is professionally managed by Freedom Property Management and offered for rent by Tiffany Suarez with Homestead Realty.
(RLNE3569648) Other Amenities - Parking, Other- attic-strs pull dwn, alarm system, laundry area, blinds, corian counters, drapes/curtains, exhaust fans, fireplace equip, wood floors, fireplace-woodburning, icemaker, master bathroom, near parkway, near library, daycare nearby, near schools, oven/range-electric, public sewer, public water, chair railing, drapery rods, trash service, ceramic tiles, end unit, double vanities, w/w carpeting, rear fenced courtyard, Yard, Patio. Appliances - Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Garbage Disposal, Washer & Dryer, Microwave. Pet policies - Small Dogs Allowed, Cats Allowed.

Description:
(571) 237-3563 - Renovated and Modern 3 Bedroom, 2 Bath Condo - Property Id: 36886
Great commuting location with building front DASH and Metro stops and easy access to 395, 495 and a number of major secondary roads. 
This top floor, corner unit offers spectacular 16th story views as well as the convenience of a Harris Teeter, banking, multiple restaurants and shopping all just across the street. 
Enjoy biking and jogging trails, multiple parks, or a quiet trip to the library all within an easy walk from the secure building. The outside pool makes for great summer entertainment and you can keep both your mind and body in shape with the private lending library and fitness center. 
Ample off street parking available (up to three vehicles), laundry facilities on each floor of the building, trash, water, heat, air conditioning and electric included in the rent. 
Freshly painted, renovated kitchen and bathrooms, flooring and more!
**Be sure to ask about special discounts for extended lease and high credit scores!**
Apply at TurboTenant: http://rent.turbotenant.com/properties/4600-duke-street 
Property Id 36886
No Pets Allowed

Description:
(202) 338-0300 - 3 bd 3 1/2 bth townhouse with 2 car garage - Elegant and large 2500 sqft 3 bedroom 3 1/2 bath brick townhouse with a 2 car garage in a wonderful community. Entry level has french doors which lead to a private office or den. The main level has all hardwood floors, large open living space with kitchen, dining area and living space w. fireplace. Upper level has bedrooms with high ceilings and loaded with sunlight. This fantastic community has free Metro shuttle service, beautiful park, gym, restaurant, coffee shop, elementary school and a Sunday farmers' market.
(RLNE3524582) Other Amenities - Other- row brick.

Description:
(703) 457-0071 - Colecroft Station: Fabulous Top-Floor Condo at Metro, Balcony Views, 2 Garage Spaces - Light filled penthouse just steps from the Braddock Metro in mid-rise elevator building. Soaring ceilings create open and airy spaces that offer spacious sized rooms of this beautifully appointed 2BR 2.5BA condo. Elegant marble foyer. Fabulous living room w/ fireplace that leads to a large balcony. 2 walk-in storage areas off the balcony plus 2 garage parking spaces. No smoking, 1 pet under 20 lbs possible. Available NOW!
Qualifications: 2 years of full-time employment history, 2 years of rental history (or home ownership), good credit, annual income of at least $110,000 (for groups sharing, that would be the sum of the 2 lowest incomes). 
Lease term: 12 to 24 months
Security deposit: $2,750.00
Pet deposit: $500 per animal
Application fee: $50
Move-in fee in deposit is $200 and move in fee is $100.
Move in is Monday-Friday 9am- 2pm.
Saturday( Only first and last Saturday of every month)- $200.
No Sunday move ins allowed.
Tenants MUST call city of Alexandria 3 days before moving in to reserve space. 703-746-4035. 
Listed by Tammy Elkins, Realtor.
For information and showings call 703-457-0071
or email ttamelkins@bhgpremier.com with your phone number.
Showings by appointment.
This property is professionally managed by 
Peake Management, Inc. 
450 N. Washington St. 
Suite M
Falls Church, VA 22046
Office: (703) 448-0212 
Licensed in the Commonwealth of Virginia

This top floor, 2 bedroom, 2 bath condo boasts 1035 sf. with updates just completed including all new bathrooms and kitchen with new tile floors, cherry cabinets and granite countertops. Hardwood floors and vaulted ceilings grace the living/dining room with fireplace and triple wide glass doors leading out onto a balcony. Master suite includes 2 large closets. Washer and dryer included in unit. One reserved, covered parking spot. Less than 3/4 of a mile from the Van Dorn Metro, with a bus stop 20 ft from the front door! This secure building features a gym, party room and elevators. Walk to restaurants and shopping! Cat ok, small dog ok. Updates just completed! Ready for immediate move in. Move In Fee - $300 for elevator reservation.

Home features wall to wall carpeting, window coverings, walk in closets, large open floor plan. Laundry room in building. Water, Sewer & Gas included in rent!!! On-Site Parking. Unit has one assigned space. Conveniently located near 495, Old Town Alexandria, Shopping, and restaurants!!
No Pets Allowed
(RLNE1873204) Other Amenities - Other- gas heat, water & sewer & gas included. Appliances - Dishwasher, Refrigerator, Range. Pet policies - No Dogs Allowed, No Cats Allowed.

Pet Policy: Dogs and Cats Allowed

This top floor, 2 bedroom, 2 bath condo boasts 1035 sf. with updates just completed including all new bathrooms and kitchen with new tile floors, cherry cabinets and granite countertops. Hardwood floors and vaulted ceilings grace the living/dining room with fireplace and triple wide glass doors leading out onto a balcony. Master suite includes 2 large closets. Washer and dryer included in unit. One reserved, covered parking spot. Less than 3/4 of a mile from the Van Dorn Metro, with a bus stop 20 ft from the front door! This secure building features a gym, party room and elevators. Walk to restaurants and shopping! Cat ok, small dog ok. Updates just completed! Ready for immediate move in. Description:
4550 STRUTFIELD LN #2324, ALEXANDRIA, VA 22311
.
Available Immediately is this fantastic 2 Bedroom 2 Bath Condo WITH 2 GARAGE SPOTS! Located in highly desired Palazzo at Park Center, makes this an easy commute to Washington DC, Pentagon, National Airport, Georgetown, Olde Town Alexandria, and Arlington. Close to Public Transportation, Shops, Restaurants, and the famous Alexandria/Arlington Lifestyle so many desire. 
.
This home features Garage parking, plenty of street parking, hardwood floors, modern kitchen and bathrooms, balcony, desirable location, fireplace, in unit washer/dryer, ceiling fans, gas heat, and so much more.
.
Located near Clubhouse, it offers a pool, a fitness center, meeting rooms, and more. Nearby are fitness trails, and the Potomac River.
.
Pets considered on a case by case basis.
.
Online application process, and rent payments with TMKenny Property Services. See our reviews on Yelp, Google, Angie's List, and Thumbtack.
.
EOH

Description: This is the one you are waiting for! Fabulously updated brick townhouse Amazing location EZ access to new Marc Center, 395 Beltway! Cul de sac location walk to shops, Harris Teeter, Starbucks, schools etc. Full renovated kitchen with large island suitable to breakfast stools. Stainless steel appliances, marble backsplash with an open concept. Upstairs contains all new carpet as well as fully renovated master bath and guest bath. Basement would make a great Family room with newly tiled floor, deluxe gas fireplace and a wet bar with travertine backsplash. Also included in the unit are a new washer and dryer. Having served in the military I appreciate your service and want to make this transition as smooth as possible.

Description:
End unit townhouse in the park-like Amberleigh neighborhood near the Ft. Belvoir Telegraph gate and Wegmans shopping center. There are several playgrounds with ample fields, basketball, and tennis courts. The townhouse is located on a large circle with ample overflow parking. The neighborhood has a paved bike trail leading to the Franconia Springfield metro (12-minute walk). The townhouse has hardwood floors and ceramic tiles throughout with a carpeted basement and stairs. The kitchen, master hallways baths have been recently remodeled.
Apply here: http://rtd4.com/256458 ($50 Application Fee)

Description: This is a beautiful and completely renovated 2/2 condo in Tiers of Manchester a great location in Alexandria VA Multiple commute options from this location. Condo is an open floor plan with gorgeous Brazilian cherry hardwood floors throughout fireplace kitchen with granite counters master bath with marble floors and vanity and Kohler soaking tub Loft overlooking great room is perfect for an office or workout area. Recently Updated Townhouse. AVAILABLE September 2017. Shows Well. Beautiful dark hardwood floors, updated kitchen and baths (granite, stainless steel appliances and tiles), very spacious Loft and a garage. Walking distance to shopping. Easy commute to Fort Belvoir, Old Town Alexandria, DC and Metro. MUST SEE!
Gas and Water Include - Military Discounts

Description:
- AVAILABLE NOVEMBER 9
- Winner of Alexandria Beautification Award!
- New Granite Counters in Kitchen & Stainless Steel Appliances
- Gleaming hardwood floors & designer paint colors
- High ceilings & crown molding 
- Large walk-in closet!
- Central Heat/AC!
- Beautiful courtyards with flowers, plants, trees, & lawns 
- Home of the State Champion Green Ash Tree!
(Largest in the state of Virginia)
- Private parking lot (street parking is also available) 
- Laundry room on-site (with sign-up sheet for scheduling your own convenient time) 
- Hot & cold running water, trash pick-up, & recycling, are included 
- Gas Cooking & Electricity are not included 
- New low-E, argon, energy-efficient, vinyl windows
- Convenient to Braddock Rd. & King St. METRO stops (Yellow/Blue Lines) or there are buses very close by.
-Our Alexandria apartment rentals are "green" 
& eco-friendly because we utilize low VOC paints, single stream recycling center, water conservation, 
& energy-efficient appliances & windows. 
The Del Ray Neighborhood: 
- Rapidly expanding, very hip part of Alexandria 
http://www.visitdelray.com 
- Full of restaurants, bars, coffee shops, ice cream parlors, farmer's market, & independently owned businesses 
- Short distance from Historic Old Town Alexandria & George Washington Parkway to DC. 
- Alexandria recognized as one of the best walking cities in America 
& the best walking city in Virginia 
The pictures were taken from an apartment with similar floor plan. 
Visit our website:
http://www.RentManorHouseApartments.com
See our good reviews:
http://www.ApartmentRatings.com/rate/VA-Alexandria-Manor-House-Apartments.html

Living room
Dining room
Walk-in closet
Range / Oven

Dishwasher
Garbage disposal
Stainless steel appliances
Freezer
Yard
Lawn
Heat: forced air

Cable-ready

COMMUNITY FEATURES
Vintage building
Secured entry
Near transportation
Barbecue
Off-street parking
On-street parking
LEASE TERMS
12 month lease

Description:
Lovely newly renovated 2 bedroom 2 bathroom apartment conveniently located walking distance from Braddock road and King st. Metros. Located in the heart of Old Town Alexandria only a block from King streets restaurants and shopping. Master bedroom has walk-in closet and private bathroom. Small or medium dogs allowed on a case by case basis.
Utilities included
$2400.00/mo, $2400.00 security deposit. Electric, heat, gas and air conditioning are included. This property is managed by a responsible landlord using Rentalutions landlord software.

Features include gourmet kitchen, granite countertops, marble tile, chrome fixtures, wide plank hardwood floors, custom cabinets in the office, and more! Garage parking that includes storage unit. Building features include metro shuttle service, fitness center, sports courts, dog park, pool and much more!
