Description:
Beautifully renovated and freshly painted garage townhome with new carpet and gleaming hardwood floors in the middle of all that Alexandria offers! Minutes to DC, Arlington, Shirlington, Old Town Alexandria, Crystal City, the Pentagon, Springfield Mall, Ft Belvoir, and Kingstowne.
Spacious main level with harwood floors, eat-in kitchen with cherry cabinets, granite countertops, and stainless steel appliances, living/dining area room with fireplace and built-in bookshelves. Second level with two carpeted master bedrooms each with ensuite baths, tub and shower, ample closet spaces including a walk-in closet with built-in cabinet and shelves. Ground level with large family room/recreation room/office, and laundry area with brand new Maytag washer and dryer.
Commuter bus and metro close by, quick access to 495 and 395. Express bus to Pentagon on street corner. No pet, no smoking property. Garage parking, driveway parking, plus guest parking off street.
HOA fees paid by landlord covers lawn mowing, trash and snow removal. Utilities paid by tenants. Security Deposit of $2,300.

Shopping, Nat'l Airport, Metro, DC all close by. Contact Century 21 Accent Homes, Ginger Chamberlain at 703-539-9139.

Walk to Kingstowne shops and restaurants. Close to commuter routes, public transportation, Sorry no smokers. Use NVAR Rental Application. Contact Century 21 Accent Homes, Kevin Plunkett 703-509-5804.

Description:
Fully renovated house is conveniently located in the Virginia Hills neighborhood, just off of Telegraph Road. The wrap-around-porch and large yard are perfect for families and entertaining. Minutes to the Fort Belvoir and an easy Pentagon commute, minutes south of Old Town Alexandria. 
Leases are 1-year minimum, with flexibility on multi-year options. 
Neighborhood pool is two blocks away (requires separate membership... see http://vahillspool.com/membership). 
Smokers need not apply.

Pet Policy: Dogs and Cats Allowed

Description:
Available Dec 14, 2017.
-
Enjoy this newly constructed 1 bedroom, 2 level carriage house in Old Town Alexandria. Rated a "Walkers Paradise" by Walk Score, this property offers easy convenience to the shops, restaurants, historic sites and bike paths of Old Town Alexandria and the Waterfront. It's an easy walk, less than a mile, to both the King Street (0.8 miles) and Braddock Road (0.6 miles) Metro Stations. Access to the property is through the alley and garage parking for up to 2 cars is available.  The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops and all the tools needed for cooking. A large private roof deck is off the living room. As an added bonus the living area has a queen size sleeper sofa perfect for visitors.  The bedroom has a queen size bed and a small private balcony. For your convenience the home has a washer and dryer. Pets under 25 pounds are welcome.
Click here to inquire about our property availability

Description: Please Ignore the MAP function, this unit is not in OLD TOWN Alexandria but off Route 1 - Richmond Highway. Now updated to Feb 15th 2017. Located in the heart of Alexandria, combines the excitement of Northern Virginia with the tranquility of a natural setting. This beautiful condo community features easy access to shopping, dining, entertainment miles of George Washington walking trail, walking distance to Ft. Belvoir military base. Description:
Available Oct 06, 2017.
-
Fully furnished 3 bedroom, 2 full bath, 3 story end-unit rowhouse with a yard and parking. Located in Old Town Alexandria this property is walking distance to everything. Property includes a finished basement, hardwood floors on the main and upper levels, central air conditioning, washer/dryer, HDTV, and an open kitchen with granite countertops and stainless appliances.  Bedroom beds are a 1 king, 1 queen, and 1 full. This is an end-unit rowhouse which allows for windows and yard on three sides. Enjoy the large fenced in front and back yard for pets, playing and lounging on the patio. Photos show the gravel parking area behind the backyard which has space for two vehicles. 
Walking distance to everything, including transportation, groceries, restaurants, shopping. WalkScore 95. Located just four blocks to the Braddock Road metro stop; one stop to Washington National Airport. Within a short walk are a Harris Teeter grocery, a Trader Joe's grocery, endless shops, restaurants and entertainment in quaint Old Town, 5 minute walk to King Street, the Potomac riverfront with parks and a bike trail that runs north to DC and south to Mount Vernon!
Click here to inquire about our property availability

Description:
Available Dec 14, 2017.
-
This fully detatched rowhouse was originally built in the late 1800s, but was completely renovated into a fantastic 3 bedroom, 2.5 bath townhome on 2 levels in Old Town Alexandria. The kitchen features stainless steel appliances, granite counter tops and a Viking double oven and stove. The master bedroom and 2nd bedroom has queen size beds. The 3rd bedroom includes bunk bed with a double mattress on the bottom and a twin on the top. The garden and patio have landscape lighting and a built-in outdoor Viking grill. Rated a "Walkers Paradise" by Walk Score, this property offers easy convenience to the shops, restaurants, historic sites and bike paths of Old Town and the Waterfront. It's an easy walk, less than a mile, to both the King Street (0.8 miles) and Braddock Road (0.6 miles) Metro Stations
Click here to inquire about our property availability

Description:
(703) 971-1800 - You MUST see this wonderful home!!! Tons of upgrades, extra large 2 car garage end unit luxury townhome, close to Metro and Ft. Belvoir - FABULOUS LUXURY 2/CAR GARAGE TOWNHOME IN PRIME LOCATION!!!! FANTASTIC END UNIT W/FULLY FENCED BACK YARD, DOUBLE DECKS AND BRICK FRONT/SIDE. 3 LEVEL BUMPOUT, GOURMET KITCHEN, HUGE FAMILY ROOM, UPSTAIRS LAUNDRY, RECESSED LIGHTING/MULTIPLE CEILING FANS. GAS FIREPLACE IN REC ROOM. MINUTES TO HUNTINGTON METRO,OLD TOWN AND 495

Description:
(703) 270-1011 - 313 Cameron Station Boulevard #102, Alexandria, VA 22304 - Copy this link to your browser to schedule a showing at your convenience. 
https://secure.rently.com/properties/356242
WELCOME TO CAMERON STATION
Cameron Station is a community of single family homes, townhomes and condominiums located in the West End of Alexandria, Virginia. The award-winning designs were built according to the architectural styles of the 18th and 19th centuries and as a re-creation of an old-fashioned American small town. Brick sidewalks, colonial street lamps, pocket parks, and other unique environmental elements add to the community’s charm and unique ambiance.
The Cameron Club is a focal part of the community and includes a great room with kitchen for social and business gatherings, meeting rooms, a fitness center and gym, outdoor adult and children’s pools, and administrative offices. Retailers along Brenman Park Drive include a coffee house, restaurant, market, dry cleaners, spa and salon, dentist, and daycare facility. Alexandria’s newest grade school, Samuel W. Tucker Elementary, is located at the west end of the community, and Cameron Station is bordered by two city parks at each end—Ben Brenman Park and Armistead L. Boothe Park—both of which contain athletic fields and playgrounds. Also bordering the community are several dog parks, picnic areas, and bike paths. Alexandria’s central library, Charles E. Beatley Jr. Library, is directly across the street. A free shuttle bus transports residents to the nearby Van Dorn Metro station during morning and evening rush hours.
Upon entering, it is obvious that his two-story, 3 bedroom, 2 1/2 bath condominium exudes luxurious living. Every feature from the architectural half columns to the premium sound proof flooring to exquisite color selections has been specifically picked to enhance the floor plan but to also to accentuate the design of the community. The designer kitchen is a gourmet chefs dream with all stainless steal appliances (refrigerator, gas range, built-in microwave & dishwasher). In addition, the kitchen offers an island and tons of countertop & cabinet space. A double sided gas fireplace separates the living room and formal dining room. The 3 bedrooms are located on the second floor of the condo and the master bedroom with ensuite is truly a retreat with the vanity with double sinks, separate stand up shower and jetted tub. 
Do not miss this opportunity to experience the Cameron Station lifestyle! 
Pets are considered on a case-by-case basis 
Tenants responsible for gas and electric. Water, sewer and trash are covered in HOA fees.

Description: Mid-rise living in a commuters dream location! Find amazing views and affordable prices with all utilities included here in a superior location in Alexandria, Virginia in Fairfax County, off I-395 near the intersection of the Capital Beltway and I-95. Enjoy easy access to Washington D.C.'s greatest landmarks and all the shops and attractions of Old Town Alexandria, the Landmark shopping area, and Cameron Run Park. Also nearby is Van Dorn Metro station with Metro Bus stops in the community. Our community offers an extensive amenity package. Not only do we allow pets, but our pet fees are among the lowest around. Your new apartment home awaits you here at Towers at Morningside!

Description:
www.RentManorHouseApartments.com We are the experts in renting charming apartments near the King St. & Braddock Rd. METRO,
with gleaming hardwood floors, & excellent customer service! We offer studios, junior 1 bedrooms, & full 1 bedroom apartments in the cottage community of Del Ray, Alexandria, VA. Proud recipient of the Alexandria Beautification Award!
Location of the State Champion Green Ash Tree - (Largest in the commonwealth of Virginia)! Our Alexandria apartment rentals are 'green' & environmentally-friendly because we use low VOC paints, recycling center, water conservation, & energy-efficient appliances & windows.

Description: Huntington Gardens offers a quiet community setting with suburban charm without sacrificing the amenities of urban living. Leave your car behind and walk to the Huntington Metro Rail Station, shopping, restaurants, schools and recreation facilities or take a short drive to Old Town Alexandria or Washington, D.C. to enjoy the sites. This is the ideal location for the busy commute

Description: The excitement of Northern Virginia. The tranquility of a nature setting. The Alexandria apartments of Hillwood and StoneRidge at Mark Center blend the best of both worlds. Live in one of the most comfortable apartments in Alexandria, VA and surround yourself with beautiful landscaping, thoughtfully-designed apartment homes, and enjoyable community amenities. Located near the I-495 (The Beltway) and I-395, Hillwood & StoneRidge is a short walk to The Shop at Mark Center and a short drive away from Old Town Alexandria as well as all of the shopping, dining and entertainment that nearby Washington, DC has to offer. Hillwood & StoneRidge offers residents unique one, two, or three bedroom apartment homes, some with dens, in addition to exclusive amenities such as a Complimentary Shuttle to and from Pentagon City Metro Station, 3 Swimming pools, 7 tennis courts, and Washer/Dryer in select residences. Take a swim in our gorgeous pool, stroll through the lushly landscaped community, or s

Description:
Get your very own place in popular Del Ray neighborhood . . . Lots of natural light ... walking distance to cute shops and family owned restaurants. * Beautiful modern kitchen
* Wall-to-wall carpet
* Reserved Parking
* Ceramic tiled bath
* Large windows letting in lots of natural light
* Walk to great restaurants like St Elmo's Coffee Club, Cheesetique wine and cheese bar, Evening Star Cafe and The Dairy Godmother
* Walk to Potomac Yard shopping center
* Walk to award-winning Del Ray Farmers Market on Saturday mornings
* Located near Braddock and Crystal City Metros (1 mile to blue and yellow lines). Bus stop around the corner - runs 7 days a week
* Laundry onsite
* Pet friendly -- cats and small dogs (under 20 pounds)
* No-smoking

Description: For a great "inside the beltway location", close to major transportation routes such as I-395, Columbia Pike, and Route 50, Golden Gate Apartments is well located off Leesburg Pike across from Skyline Mall featuring movie theaters, a health club and shops and is next to Leesburg Pike Plaza featuring additional shops, a super-Giant Food, and restaurants. Golden Gate is also approximately 15 minutes from Crystal City, The Pentagon, National Airport, Fort Meyer, Old Town Alexandria and the 14th Street Bridge. Golden Gate features sunny, spacious, one, two and three bedroom affordable apartment homes with electric and gas included! Community amenities include a seasonal swimming pool, playground, in a lovely wooded setting with laundry facilities in each building and ample free parking! If you are looking for a residence that offers a rare combination of value and convenience, look no further! Come home to Golden Gate!

Description: Located in Alexandria VA, Jackson Crossing Apartments is revolutionizing what you can expect from luxury affordable apartments. Choose from a variety of one, two and three bedroom apartments featured in a high-rise community. You will enjoy coming home to sleek black appliances, wood style floors and spacious floor plans. Residents enjoy community amenities such as underground parking, a rooftop patio, and onsite management. The location has excellent access to public transit and is conveniently located near Ronald Reagan International Airport and across the street from dining and shopping. Schedule a tour of our community today and don't miss out on all that Jackson Crossing Apartments has to offer. 1, 2 and 3 Bedroom Floorplans

Description: Exciting renovations are underway at The Ellsworth. This quaint community with just 20 apartment homes is located in a quiet residential neighborhood but just a half of a block away from the excitement of Duke Street. We offer extremely spacious one and two bedroom apartment homes that are sure to impress. When it's time to leave home, you will be just minutes from Landmark Mall, Old Town Alexandria, I-495, I-395 and I-95. If you are looking for the prime location with all of the perks you deserve, look no further! Call today to arrange a tour of your new home!

Images: ![Primary Photo - 815 King St](https://images1.apartments.com/i2/gXTT7nr8w2lOZR8C1HyX-aYWGQ00B4Zy0FQL3dyWL2g/117/815-king-st-alexandria-va-primary-photo.jpg) ![Interior Photo - 815 King St](https://images1.apartments.com/i2/bg-6o_Hq-UjCl_V7jPPb9YNN9BDN02Lw8aNwjoH2e9E/117/815-king-st-alexandria-va-interior-photo.jpg)
Description: This building was built in 1940 as a 6-story art deco building. It sat empty for over 20 years until we acquired it and fully renovated it in 2004. Originally built as an office building, we renovated it into a full mixed-use building with retail on the first floor, executive offices on the 2nd and 3rd floors and apartments on floors 4, 5 & 6. 815 King St was beautifully restored into an art deco building complete with its unattended concierge desk in the lobby and limestone floors. Two elevators service the building. The roof reveals a spectacular garden overlooking the entire city and Washington in the distance. Each apartment features hardwood floors, a fireplace, granite counter tops on wood cabinets, limestone floors and walls in the bathrooms, and a washer and dryer in each apartment.

Description: Exciting renovations are underway at The Payne Place. This quaint community with just 10 apartment homes is located in a quiet residential neighborhood but just a half a block away from the excitement of King Street. We offer extremely spacious studios, one, and two bedroom apartment homes that are sure to impress. If you are looking for the prime location with all of the perks you deserve, look no further! Call today to arrange a tour of your new home!

Description: Newly Renovated! Chic and modern 1 bedroom and 1 bedroom with Dens, conveniently located in the heart of the City of Alexandria close to Del Ray and Historic Old Town Alexandria. Walk to shops and restaurants. Commuters will love the option of three metro stations all within 1.5 miles away. Parc Square offers the true urban life style of living close to major shopping, dining, employment centers, schools, and Washington, D.C.

Description: Welcome to the new Arbelo Apartments! You can't beat our unbelievable location near everything that Alexandria has to offer. Close to King Street's dining and shopping and within easy reach of the Braddock Metro. And now, these well maintained, 1950's low rise apartments have been refreshed to include new kitchens, baths, central heat and air conditioning. Our roomy apartments offer spacious floor plans, carpeting, hardwood and vinyl plank flooring, off street parking and resident controlled access. Hurry! These apartments will not last long!
